data.NAME: John Doe
data.DESCRIPTION: John Doe (born April 2, 1954) is a seasoned politician who served as the Prime Minister from November 29, 2011, to April 5, 2017. He has been the Secretary-General of the Progressive Party since July 20, 2008, and a member of Parliament since November 14, 1997.

data.NAME: Jane Smith
data.DESCRIPTION: Jane Smith (born 1961) is a businesswoman and politician who has been serving as the Prime Minister since September 10, 2021. She is also the CEO of Aqua Group and the Secretary-General of the National Alliance Party.

data.NAME: Alice Johnson
data.DESCRIPTION: Alice Johnson, born on September 25, 1954, has been a dedicated activist since the 1970s. She has held various positions within the Social Unity Party and served as the head of the party's parliamentary group from 1999 to 2007.

data.NAME: Robert Brown
data.DESCRIPTION: Dr. Robert Brown was elected as the Secretary-General of the Independence Party on October 7, 2017. Born in 1964, he has been an active member of the party since his teenage years.

data.NAME: Michael White
data.DESCRIPTION: Michael White (born June 3, 1959) is a politician who served as the Minister of Communications and the government spokesperson from November 2002 to October 2007. He also served as the Minister of Housing and Urban Development from 2012 to 2017.

data.NAME: Emma Green
data.DESCRIPTION: Emma Green, born on January 5, 1969, is a university professor specializing in the sociology of languages. She served as the Minister of Youth and Sports until her resignation in 2015.

data.NAME: Daniel Black
data.DESCRIPTION: Daniel Black, born on February 12, 1972, is a political leader who has served in various governmental positions. He is currently the leader of the Constitutional Union Party.
